page.title: 15Entertainment
page.content:
Entertainment
Television is a main source of entertainment. Other attractions are music, discos, parties, computers and theatres. Most boys like to play football. Another attraction is BMXing. This is stunt riding on a special bike called a BMX. Snooker is a popular indoor sport played by two people and made popular by television coverage. Computers are very useful. You can learn things and play games on them. There are many sources of indoor entertainment e.g. video, television, computers, books. The theatre puts on operas such as Pagliacci and plays. These are usually performed for about a week: the shows change every week.
